concept.title: Hybrid Cloud Use Cases
concept.shortdesc: Eucalyptus addresses the following use cases for using a hybrid cloud.

ul.li: Cloud bursting or resource expansion: In this use case, you would need to create additonal resources for your cloud, using resources from another cloud.
Migrating your cloud: In this use case, you would need to export data (images, volumes, configuration, etc.) to another cloud.
